translated: The Mansion on the Plane of the Gods
The Male Mansion🔽The Chapter on Pāyāsi
“Just as a variegated creeper shines in the forest,
the supreme pleasure garden of the Thirty-Three,
so too this your mansion shines,
You have attained the divine power of the gods, you of great influence.
What merit did you make as a human being?
By what are you so radiant,

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ ca te sabbadisā pabhāsati iti
translated: and your beauty shining in all directions?”
this is the fruit of that deed.
“My wife and I, in the human world,

analyzed: opāna bhūtāḥ gharam āvasimha  annam ca pānam ca pasanna cittā
translated: lived in a house that was like a place of rest.🔽With a serene mind, we respectfully gave
generous gifts of food and drink.
Because of that, I have such beauty,

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ ca me sabbadisā pabhāsati iti
translated: and my beauty shines in all directions.”
The Second Human Mansion, the Second.
